title: <mark>7 Psychological Triggers</mark> <mark>That Shape Every Decision</mark>
items: Read 30 minutes daily - <mark>Compound knowledge over time</mark>
Wake up at 5 AM - <mark>Own your morning, own your day</mark>
Track your expenses - <mark>What gets measured gets managed</mark>
Learn a high-income skill - <mark>Invest in yourself first</mark>
Say no to distractions - <mark>Protect your focus</mark>
